segments.advisor_message: So, let's start off with some basic info! Can you tell me your first and last name?
segments.client_message: Yeah, I'm Jessica Smith. Just Jessica, no middle names or anything.

segments.advisor_message: Great! And how about your date of birth, Jessica?
segments.client_message: Oh, sure! Uh, it’s the 15th of April, 1990. I was born in, um, New York.
